message: Hi Bob, let's agree now and avoid future inflation losses. Accepting now means you secure 310K in full value rather than facing a 10% discount in later rounds. I believe this 69/31 split is fair given our different discount factors. Looking forward to a quick agreement!
Alice, I believe a 60/40 split is fairer given the different inflation rates.  Let's work together to get a deal before we lose too much value.
